snippet: In a court brief filed on Monday, AlixPartners contends that a McKinsey employee copied confidential files belonging to AlixPartners and destroyed a crucial document just as the court signaled it planned to ask for a forensic analysis.
abstract: In a court brief filed on Monday, AlixPartners contends that a McKinsey employee copied confidential files belonging to AlixPartners and destroyed a crucial document just as the court signaled it planned to ask for a forensic analysis.

headline.main: In Case Filed by Rival, McKinsey Faces Scrutiny Over Employees' Actions
